scripts.yarn:install: echo 'Beginning yarn install!' && yarn install && echo 'Done installing yarn!'
scripts.clean:local: echo 'Beginning cleaning in local environment!' && yarn clean && rm -rf .yarnclean && rm -dfr node_modules/ && echo 'Done cleaning local environment!' && yarn yarn:install
scripts.prod:clean: echo 'Beginning cleaning in production environment!' && rm -Rf 'public/packs' && rm -Rf 'public/assets' && echo 'Done cleaning production environment!'
scripts.prod:build: echo 'Beginning production build with webpack!' && RAILS_ENV=production bin/webpack && echo 'Done building webpack for production environment and precompiling assets for rails!' && RAILS_ENV=production bin/rails assets:precompile && echo 'Finished production build!'
scripts.prod:start: echo 'Starting production server!' && RAILS_SERVE_STATIC_FILES=true RAILS_LOG_TO_STDOUT=true bin/rails s -e production
scripts.prod:local: yarn clean:local && yarn prod:clean && yarn prod:build && yarn prod:start
